articles.content: THE GIMMICKS,by Chris McCormick. (Harper, $27.99.) McCormicks novel begins in the early 1970s, nearly 60 years after the Armenian genocide conducted by the Ottoman Empire. The story follows two cousins in Soviet Armenia who consider themselves brothers: Ruben… [+3166 chars]

articles.author: Shannon Hall
articles.title: Volcanoes on Venus Might Still be Smoking
articles.description: Planetary science experiments on Earth suggest that the sun’s second planet might have ongoing volcanic activity.
articles.content:
Venus is our toxic twin. Its chemical makeup, size and density is similar to our worlds, although its hellish temperatures can melt lead, and its atmosphere is rife with sulfuric acid.
But it may be even more Earthlike that we knew. A paper published last we… [+981 chars]
